channel.title: What do i do now?
channel.description:
Okie everyone, just bought 1g of gooood marihuana... but like iv'e never done this before... should i bong it>? joint>? please tell me
And is $15AUD a good price lol?

item.title: What do i do now?
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

Okie everyone, just bought 1g of gooood marihuana... but like iv'e never done this before... should i bong it>? joint>? please tell me

And is $15AUD a good price lol?

Easiest bowl ever:
Take an empty coke can, push in the side making a little indent. Poke some tiny (pin sized) holes in the indent. Then make a small hole 90 degrees from the indent (about half the size of a penny). Put the weed on top of the indent (the bowl) and put your thumb over the small hole (the rush). Breath in through where you usually drink, holding a lighter over the weed. When you feel smoke coming into your lungs, let go of the rush. The air coming in through the rush will force the smoke in the can down your lungs, causing you to get high on marijuana.

15$ is a crap price. But don’t buy single grams anyway, it’s a rip.

Read full topic

item.title: What do i do now?
item.dc:creator: @kurt pixels
item.description:
@kurt wrote:

[quote=“Cheatest, post:6, topic:25231”]your a retard… burn a little bit of it if it smells good its pot if it smells like something you cook with is oregano (stuff you season meat with)

This is how its done,

  1. Get a honey flavored cigar
  2. Unroll it be careful not to mess it up.
  3. Empty the tobacco out
  4. fill it with weed
  5. roll it back up get some spit on there
  6. put a lighter under it to dry the spit don’t burn it
  7. puff and lick your lips it tastes good as fuck
  8. if your living with your parents and is “good” like you say so don’t go around because no matter what you see you will start laughing like your mom will look at you and you laugh and cant stop you drop some cereal and boom it happens again ha ha… i could not stop laughing because i was laughing owned??

P.S. no matter what fucks say you get addicted to weed its wrong you don’t.[/quote]

Wow, I’m so impressed you know this!

Read full topic

P.S. no matter what fucks say you get addicted to weed its wrong you don’t.[/quote]

I’ve been smokin weed but I ain’t addicting, I never have the urge to smoke it I just do.

item.title: What do i do now?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

If you have the materials, roll it into 1 or two joints and smoke’em. Preferbly I think smoking from a pipe is the easiest most convienant way.

Thats a horrible price, I pay 5-10 canadian dollars for a gram of good hydro. Although that is on the cheap side, you should still be able to get it much much cheaper then 15 aud.

Since it’s your first time I’ll make a suggestion: Try only smoking half of the gram. On your first time you almost never get high, and all you should need to get high is about half a gram anyways. Then some other time you can smoke the other half and you’ll probably still get very baked(first time is amazing) Also make sure you inhale properly. Breath it in, don’t suck in. My first few times I realized I had been inhaling improperly the entire time. Do it with some friends is probably my only other suggestion.

Read full topic
